articles.title: Frequently Asked Questions
articles.contents:
Are children allowed at the wedding?
No, unfortunately we cannot accommodate children at the wedding. Only named invitees please!
What is the dress code?
We do not have a specific dress code and want you to dress in a way that you feel comfortable. Bridal party will be wearing black, but this should not limit you from wearing that color - just please refrain from wearing any black dresses from Park and Fifth to avoid matching someone exactly.
What do I do between the ceremony and cocktail hour?
The short answer is, whatever you like! There is time to go back to your hotel, walk through the public gardens, or pop up the street to the Oxford Tap Room for a quick beer before the reception gets started.
St. Mary’s Boat Club is down the hill from the church and is a lovely area to walk. It holds many of the beautiful old Halifax homes along the Northwest Arm. If you’re a little early to the boat club, that is no problem! The deck overlooks the arm and is a lovely place to enjoy beautiful views and breathe in that fresh ocean air.
What are the available accommodations?
We have a group rate of $219/night at the Cambridge Suites (1583 Brunswick St.).

articles.title: Alex & Chris
articles.description: Everything you need to know for September 27, 2025!
articles.contents:
Schedule
Friday, September 26, 2025
7:30pm – 1:00am: Welcome / Pub Night
The Stillwell Freehouse2534 Agricola St.
Join us at our favourite local establishment! Dress code is casual / what you would usually wear to a pub on a Friday night. We have booked out the entire venue so don’t be discouraged by the “closed for private event” sign you will see. We are the private event.
Saturday, September 27, 2025
2:00 – 3:00pm: Ceremony
St. Thomas Aquinas Catholic Church1725 Oxford St.
Please leave yourself plenty of time to arrive as there is lots of construction in the area and parking can be tricky if you’re driving. Please be seated by 1:55pm.
break
4:30 – 6:00pm: Cocktail Hour
St. Mary’s Boat Club1641 Fairfield Road
Hopefully the weather cooperates with us to be able to have a drink on the deck.
6:00pm – 12:00am: Dinner & Reception
St. Mary’s Boat Club1641 Fairfield Road
Move inside for dinner, speeches, DANCING.

Accommodation
We have a group rate of $219/night at the Cambridge Suites (1583 Brunswick St.).
Favourite Places & Important Locations
Key locations and our personal recommendations for Halifax! Click on the map pins for details. Add this as a list in Google Maps or as a guide in Apple Maps.

articles.title: RSVP Here!
articles.contents:
Important: No children. Please note that although we would love to host your entire family, we unfortunately will not be able to accommodate children at the wedding. Thank you!
Note: Our RSVP is a pretty simple form - if you’re responding for more than just yourself just write multiple names in the “Name(s)” field!
Please RSVP as soon as possible! We will email you closer to the wedding date for meal choices!

Loading…

articles.title: Wedding Update
articles.description: RSVP reminder, accomodations, schedule, and more
articles.contents:
Hi everyone - we just wanted to send a reminder/update email. In here you’ll find:
A note about invites
A reminder to RSVP if you have not already
Information on accomodations
A more firm schedule of the day/weekend
Info on meal selection
Invites and RSVP Reminders
A note about our invites - we mailed them around the time of the postal strike and should have been a bit more vigilant about whether people received them or not. If you’re getting this email, you are invited. We are missing some emails too, particularly of some spouses. Significant others in general were invited but if you have any uncertainty please feel free to reach out to us directly.
And on that note, if you haven’t RSVPed yet please do! It is very helpful to us to have this information as early as possible. You can RSVP here.
Accommodations
We have a block of rooms at the Cambridge Suites for $219/night which you can book at this link: https://reservations.travelclick.com/13605?groupID=4655544.
Schedule
Friday, September 26, 2025
Evening, but start time remains TBD: Stillwell Freehouse - all welcome! We have booked out the Freehouse for a private event. Please join us at our favourite local establishment.
Saturday, September 27, 2025
2pm: Ceremony @ St. Thomas Aquinas Catholic Church - we will start right on time so please be seated by 1:55pm! Expect about an hour.
3pm-4:30pm: this time is yours, check the map of our fave places on the homepage of the website for lots of good suggestions, or just pop back home or to your hotel.
4:30pm: Cocktail hour @ St. Mary’s Boat Club - bevs and snacks on the deck of St. Mary’s Boat Club if weather cooperates, inside otherwise
6pm: Move inside the boat club for dinner, speeches, dancing, etc.
Meal selection
We will start sending out meal selection to those that have RSVPed “Yes” in the coming weeks. We thank you for a quick reply!
Thanks all and can’t wait to celebrate with you!
Chris & Alex
